title: Professional Amazon/Shopify-like E-commerce Website Template (Up to 100 Products)

requirements.text: Create a professional e-commerce storefront UI (Amazon/Shopify-like) with a consistent, high-quality visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, component style) suitable for resale as a premium template.

quotes: High quality, high detail make website

acceptanceCriteria: Storefront pages use one coherent theme (no mismatched styles)
Layout is responsive for mobile/tablet/desktop
User-facing text is in English

requirements.text: Implement a complete storefront information architecture with key pages: Home, Product Listing (catalog), Product Detail, Cart, Checkout (mock/no payment), and Contact.

quotes: Ai make website to e-commerce website like Amazon/ shophy store

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation links to Home, Catalog, Cart, and Contact are present and functional
Product Detail pages are accessible from the catalog
Cart page shows selected items and totals
Checkout is present and clearly marked as a mock/demo (no real payment processing)

requirements.text: Add a prominent branding header that includes a dedicated logo placement area and a clean search bar (UI only) consistent with an Amazon/Shopify-like store experience.
acceptanceCriteria: Header includes a visible logo area (renders an image from static assets)
Header includes a search input (frontend filtering of catalog is acceptable)
Header remains usable on mobile (collapses appropriately)

requirements.text: Add an email/contact area in the site (footer and/or Contact page) including a visible business email display and a contact form UI (submission can be stored as an inquiry record).
acceptanceCriteria: Footer and/or Contact page displays a business email address field/section
Contact form includes at least name, email, and message fields with validation
Submitting the form creates an inquiry that is persisted in the backend and can be retrieved via a backend query method

requirements.text: Implement product catalog support for up to 100 products, including product images, title, price, category, rating (optional), and short description, with a clean catalog grid and filtering/sorting UI.

quotes: And only 100 products add page and

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes query methods to list products and get product details
Frontend catalog supports displaying up to 100 products without layout breaking
Each product card shows an image, title, and price at minimum
Catalog includes at least one filter (e.g., category) and one sort option (e.g., price)

requirements.text: Seed the application with a curated set of 100 demo products (suitable placeholder data for resale template) that reference locally generated static product images (no external image hotlinking required).

quotes: And only 100 products add page and

acceptanceCriteria: A first-time deploy shows a populated catalog with 100 products
Product images load from frontend static assets
No dependency on external databases or external image hosting is required to view the demo catalog

requirements.text: Implement shopping cart functionality: add to cart from product detail (and optionally catalog), adjust quantity, remove items, and show subtotal/estimated total.

quotes: e-commerce website like Amazon/ shophy store

acceptanceCriteria: Users can add a product to the cart and see it appear in Cart page
Users can change quantities and see totals update
Users can remove items from the cart

requirements.text: Create a polished Home page with a hero section, featured categories/collections, and featured products, using high-detail generated imagery that matches the theme.

quotes: High quality, high detail make website

acceptanceCriteria: Home page contains a hero banner area, at least one featured category/collection section, and a featured products section
Featured products link to their Product Detail pages
Hero and/or category visuals use generated static assets

requirements.text: Add static generated images to the project under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI (logo, hero, and product imagery).
acceptanceCriteria: All required generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated
Header logo renders from the generated assets path
Home hero renders from the generated assets path
Products render images from the generated assets path (direct static file references)

constraints: Use only the provided stack: Motoko single-actor backend and React+TypeScript frontend with Tailwind/Shadcn and React Query.
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed by the system; compose UI components instead.
No external databases or third-party backend services.
nonGoals: Real payment processing (Stripe/PayPal) and order fulfillment/shipping integrations
Third-party authentication providers beyond Internet Identity (not required for this template)
Admin dashboard unless explicitly requested later
